paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, focusing on the Val122Ile variant and its penetrance data.

patients.demographics: Median age 74.3 years for Black patients, 75.9 years for White patients; 46% Black

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Black patients more commonly had Val122Ile disease compared with White patients (79% vs 1%; P < 0.001)

functional_data.summary: The Val122Ile variant is associated with a more aggressive form of ATTR-CM.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in families, particularly in Black patients.
variants.population_frequency: High prevalence in Black patients, specifically noted in the study.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical association and statistical significance.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is the most common genotype in the cohort studied.
key_quotes: The most common genotype was p.Val122Ile (n = 110 [39%]).
Black patients more commonly had Val122Ile disease compared with White patients (79% vs 1%; P < 0.001).

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text, focusing on the TTR gene.
